title: 游戏崩溃，求解
author: Antonie
txt_content:
我现在只要一加载世界，刚刚加载完毕就会出现“Java SE已停止工作”的对话框
版本是1.11.2，Java8。不知道有没有用，我把log放出来：
[21:36:01] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: Star_Wind_ICE
[21:36:03] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[21:36:03] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[21:36:05] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[21:36:05] [Thread-5/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[21:36:05] [Thread-5/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[21:36:07] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[21:36:07] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[21:36:20] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas
[21:36:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.11.2
[21:36:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[21:36:34] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0
[21:36:35] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 10%
[21:36:36] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 22%
[21:36:37] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 40%
[21:36:38] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 63%
[21:36:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 85%
[21:36:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 12, from 10
[21:36:40] [Server thread/INFO]: Star_Wind_ICE[local:E:335fa581] logged in with entity id 442 at (46.5, 62.0, -62.5)
[21:36:40] [Server thread/INFO]: Star_Wind_ICE加入了游戏
[21:36:41] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving and pausing game...
[21:36:41] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界----'/Overworld
[21:36:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界----'/Nether
[21:36:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界----'/The End

如果是多人游戏，最后就只有一句：[21:35:19] [Client thread/INFO]: [CHAT] Star_Wind_ICE joined the game
再无下文。
求各路大神解决该问题。

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
刚刚加载完毕就会出现“Java SE已停止工作”的对话框
更换一个Java。目前Java8已经一百多个不同尾号了，换一个100-的看看。
如果没啥用，看看是不是你显卡驱动抽了，，，就在C:\Windows\System32下找这三个之一（有多少找多少吧）：igfxEM.exe nvoglv64.dll(或者nvoglv32.dll) atioglx1.dll(或atioglx2.dll, atioglx3.dll, atioglxx.dll之类)右键他们的属性可以查看版本号。（因为我觉得这有点像是N卡3.7849的驱动）
不想查看版本号直接去下个驱动精灵，更新显卡驱动吧……

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
请附上崩溃报告
MC崩溃了有MC的报告(.minecraft/crash-reports/)
VM崩溃了有VM的报告(.minecraft/hs_err_PID.log)

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
Antonie 发表于 2018-1-1 10:43
请问能发一个吗，我在网上现在找不到
https://pan.baidu.com/s/1c1X50f2
另：差不多可以认为是Intel显卡驱动的锅了。
找到C:\Windows\System32\ig75icd64.dll，右键点开属性，看看版本是多少？并且试试看更新一下。

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
ig75icd64.dll
十有**是显卡驱动的问题了
请您更新一下您的显卡驱动
